name: Starfall: The 5th Age
description:
Throughout history, the Starfalls- once-a-century meteor showers- have brought with them great power and great devastation. The fallen stars brought magic to the world which fostered civilization, but also destroyed much of it. As the 5th Starfall begins, you set out into a world of danger to claim the power to protect your home!

Dual Class System- 12 different classes to combine into powerful builds!

Collect unique equipment- Utility-oriented item designs mean gear is more than just numbers!

Face augmented monsters- Fallen stars can imbue enemies with special powers. Defeat them and you may claim some of this power as your own!

Expansions planned for the future which will add more classes and areas!
